website_summaries.verdict: A complete system packed with everything you need for numerous grout cleaning tasks, including a grout tool. Whether your grout is on floors or walls, these tools can accomplish most tasks.
pros: Packed with tools and accessories for cleaning grout on floors and walls, including a handheld and mop steamer
Comes with scrubbers and pads for a variety of tasks
Can be used without harsh chemicals
cons: Steam may not be sufficient for tough stains and dirt
There is a learning curve to figuring out all of its capabilities

customer_reviews.title: Overall great
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by how well the grout cleaner worked. The handheld device steam is very powerful but overall gave the product a 4 as the steam power is not as strong when mopping.
customer_reviews.author: liveth ramos

customer_reviews.title: I don’t love it, but I like it
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting more... Cons: - didn’t budge mildew in the shower - doesn’t hold much water so need to refill often - doesn’t seem super strong (heat? pressure?) - strain on the back while mopping floor (too short) Pros: - like that it can be a handheld or mop/extended - worked great on tiled kitchen counter - so much easier than an old fashioned mop for tiled floors - quite satisfying to see dirt lifted off grout
customer_reviews.author: Dan G

customer_reviews.title: No Chemicals! Child and Animal Safe! Cleans EVERYWHERE!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and bought another one for my mom! Steam clothes, linens, clean shower, wash walls, baseboards, stove, and ovens! I steam mop my rugs and puppy's bed, EVERYTHING! I love this thing! No chemicals, kid and puppy safe! :) I am not a paid representative, I am just VERY happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: No women ever would have designed this steam mop!!! You have to hold the very heavy top and try and push the steam button. The cord is bulky and heavy and you have to curl it up, there is nothing to wrap it around. You can not prop it up very easily and once it falls over all the water leaks out. I have a BISSELL PowerFresh Steam Mop, Floor Steamer, Tile Cleaner, and Hard Wood Floor Cleaner, 1940 that I absolutely LOVE. So I gave it to my son...AND I just returned the 2075A Bissell and ordered myself the 1940 Bissell that works.
customer_reviews.author: 5cats

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect tool to clean grout
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this to clean my grout. It's working wonderfully! I wish it gave out more pressure but it does the job, just requires a little more work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have probably swept the floor first but it still worked just fine! The capacity could be bigger-I want over my ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! My previous floor steamer gave it and this is just right. Enough warm steam to clean effectively yet not too loud. I just got it today so I haven’t used the other attachments but I’m looking forward to it. I prefer steam cleaning than cleaning with chemicals. This draws the warmth that I think is effective. Should have probably swept the floor first but it still worked just fine! The capacity could be bigger-I want over my kitchen floor twice (200 sf) having to refill once. Suck a nice tool so far!
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Works well on grout and as a fabric steamer
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that it works better than a mop for tile floors, as the results were similar to what I would get with Pinesol and a mop, BUT it works great as a fabric streamer and for cleaning grout! I have bad knees, so getting down on them to scrub grout is not an option. I was able to clean the kitchen grout that had built up dirt using the extension rod so I did not have to go on my knees to clean it. I would recommend this for grout and for steaming fabric as it quickly heats up and did a great job getting out wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Best lightweight steamer I have had
customer_reviews.text: This unit is easy to use, efficient, and effective at cleaning tile floors. This is the third type of steamer that I have purchased over the years and this works the best for the money spent. It is great to have long cord so that you can keep on cleaning and not have to move to different plugs. The other steamers cords were only 20 feet long. It was also effective in cleaning our large rain type shower head, and also cleaning grout, using the accompanied grout brush.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This was a total disappointment. I read some reviews and it was picked as #1 so I ordered it. There isn't very much steam and it takes a long time to get the floor clean. I read and reread the instructions to make sure I was doing everything correctly. Wish I could return it but husband threw away the box. Big, huge waste if money.
customer_reviews.author: julie p wesley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and works well. There were some black marks on my hardwood floors from the time I moved into my unit months ago. They were like marks that get left from black rubber shoes or furniture legs. I'd tried to get rid of the marks, but failed. The steamer did the trick, so I know it works. Only negative is that the top part is a little heavy. My mom wanted to use it to clean her shower. While she was able to, she did complain about the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is overall a great product! I love it. I am just sad that it stopped working! I was in the middle of using it and it just stopped working, it won’t turn on. It usually turns on once plugged in, but for some reason it won’t. I purchased it in November of 2019. It’s only been six months. I contact Amazon who said I needed to contact Manufacturer, who has yet to respond or be helpful. $130 for a steamer, I was confident I was purchasing the best steam cleaner for the value. How can that be considering I can’t get any help! I would like a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy!
customer_reviews.text: This machine works well, but it is so heavy! And, you need to be careful where you touch it. There are parts you wouldn’t think would be hot, but they are. I have to use it with 2 hands because of the weight. I use an oven mitt so I won’t get burned where I need to hold it. It has attachment that the instructions don’t tell you what they’re for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Redgrave

customer_reviews.title: New favorite cleaning tool
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I purchased this because of the good reviews and I am not disappointed. I have used the grout tool as well as the standard floor attachment. The various attachments are SO. Easy. To attach and most of them can be stored right on the device itself in an attachment trey thing. Really loving this so far! It would be even more awesome if we could use essential oils as well but I am not sure if the plastic is rated for oils. It’s self explanatory, easy to use. I love that it comes with a wall mount to store it. Only holds 2 cups of water at a time so prepare to refill frequently. It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Galactica

customer_reviews.title: The grout on my kitchen floor is so freakin white because of this steam mop!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this steam cleaner for barely a week and I’m obsessed! It works incredibly well and preforms everything listed in the description. The reason I bought this was to clean the grout on my kitchen floor and it went above and beyond AND it’s great not having to use chemicals. My grout is so white it looks bleached and actually I tried bleach on my grout (before I bought this steam cleaner) and it didn’t get it even close to how white they are now! Love love love!! They really should advertise more about how great of a grout cleaner it is because that would have definitely shortened the time it took me to research steam mops/grout cleaners 😂
customer_reviews.author: pip

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've used this, now, for almost 2 months and I swear by this now. I love how clean it leaves my kitchen, toilets, floors, and walls. Just anything that you can think of. I tried it on my grouts and it also worked great, although it wasn't that dirty it looked brand new when I was done. Great purchase if you like to really clean and disinfect at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Weniki

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly happy with the ease of use of this steamer
customer_reviews.text: If I were using this as a handheld it might be a different situation, but I am using as a floor steam cleaner. It is bulky, extremely top heavy and falls over when you are not holding it. The water fill is literally upside down. It is too heavy to hold and move cord while trying to aim the cleaner with all the weight at the top. I honestly do not know if the steamer is actually cleaning or just making sounds when i push the button. If I hadn't thrown the box away, I would have returned this item :(
customer_reviews.author: Stevina

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product
customer_reviews.text: We use this item to clean our tile floor since we recently got a puppy. I'm impressed with the build quality of this unit. They didn't cut corners when designing it. The unit does what is supposed to do, produce steam. It's not magic, you still have to put some muscle into it, but steam makes the job a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Flawless floors with very little effort
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a Bona mop for a long time and felt like it left the floors feeling a bit sticky/tacky. This mop does an incredible job of lifting off any residue buildup and leaves the floor flawlessly clean. To my surprise, using this is not more tedious than using a Swiffer or Bona mop either! It heats up in less than a minute and you push it around just the same. Other reviews said this mop is heavy, but I haven’t found that to be a problem. It’s no more cumbersome than a Dyson stick vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: R. James

customer_reviews.title: very heavy to carry and use
customer_reviews.text: I just used this product for the first time on my floor and a few other spots. I am a 70 year old woman and found this to be very heavy and cumbersome to hold and especially to hold down the button the entire time I was cleaning. Even the electric cord (which is very long) is heavy to drag. I am probably going to have to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great on tile
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our tile floors and shower. We don't get anywhere near the mold in the shower using this cleaner less frequently than we did with all the harsh sprays. Tile and grout on floors clean easily, including the occasional parrot droppings.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: So far, very nice.
customer_reviews.text: While the tank is not very large, this machine puts out the steam. Cleaned my kitchen floor and was pretty grossed out by the results. Excellent product, I hope it lasts. The wall mount is great, hubby already has it up and the bathroom will be next.
customer_reviews.author: Kilde: it's like "tilde" with a K.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, can’t use as much as I would like.
customer_reviews.text: I have this mop! Does the job! Has so many accessories for different things but it’s heavy! I have yet to find a way to use it without my arm hurting. So I don’t use as much as I intended to when I purchased it! So when I can I will probably invest in a more simple light weight one. I should have maybe purchased a shark one less money and probably more light weight so I would use everyday! I’ve only used this about less than 10 times due to its weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this mostly to clean countertops and bathrooms. It works great to get sticky caked on messes off of the counter and around the stove. It cleans around the bathroom sink easily. It didn’t clean my shower door from the soap scum easily. I didn’t purchase the squeegee so that may have helped. The water tank is a decent size, the cord length is great, and I love all the attachments it comes with. Sometimes the attachments twist off but only when I’m getting in odd corners. Overall, I’m happy with this purchase that I got one for my dad as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth Owning this Machine
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this steam floor cleaner. I am a "clean freak" and love that this not only cleans but sanitizes my floors. I works the best on floors and pretty good on grout. It was a bit hard to use on the shower walls above my shoulders. I also wish I waited one week to buy the Bissell PowerFresh Slim Hard Wood Floor Steam Cleaner System, Steam Mop because it went down in price by $30.00.
customer_reviews.author: y1der

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Strength
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it. Really cleaned my shower, that I've scrubbed and scrubbed by the way, and it looks brand new. I bought this because I have some medical issues that currently limit my strength and mopping, scrubbing and lots of bending, reaching...I now do not need to put forth the time and effort it took my to clean my house while being sick and for that I am extremely thankful! Will update review with more details as I use it and before and after pics.
customer_reviews.author: Kellalaa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: The functionality is why I bought the mop. I have had it a year now, and have only used it on the floors, so I guess I didn't need all the functions. It isn't durable at all. The plastic release buttons have broken off and I have to hold on to the pole now when I mop. The steam amount is decent, but if I keep water in the reservoir, it eventually leaks out.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Hribik

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say I am 100% happy but I wouldn’t say I’m disappointed either. Having to hold the button to release the steam can become tiring. After steam cleaning my floors which is LVT I was overall happy. I do wonder if this was supposed to come with the scented disk that goes into pads because I did not receive any.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdrumnc

customer_reviews.title: Has NO Power behind it
customer_reviews.text: I thought spending a bit more and buying a "brand" product I would receive a quality product. NOT! This is well build and sturdy (which I like), the major complaint is there is NO power behind it. A very weak stream of steam is produced. It takes significantly longer to clean an area that my old Shark did very quickly. There is just NO umph behind the steam, it's just too weak to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Tucsonian

customer_reviews.title: This item surprised me!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this steam mop! I first used it on my tile countertops with the flat attachment but the unit is a little too heavy to use the tile brush. It worked great on my laminate flooring and I even tested to see how well it worked on my bathroom mats. I was amazed how well it cleaned my bathroom mats, my mom uses a rollator walker and the wheels go across my lavender bathroom mats. The mats dried fast after using lots of water on it. You will have to put some elbow grease while using this but overall I'm satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Shannel88

customer_reviews.title: SO SO - DOESN’T LIVE UP TO HYPE
customer_reviews.text: I’d like this product a lot better if I would’ve paid $50 for it and then I wouldn’t feel so bad giving it to Goodwill. The little grout tools are good for one job then the bristles wear down, they’re worthless. So sad to see this is Bissell quality.
customer_reviews.author: tawny martel

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm really loving the Bissell
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with all we are able to clean. It does a great job on our wood floors and tile floors. Some of the attachments have not held up as well but I expected this from other reviews and for using it on my tile shower. I don't mind the weight of it but for some with arthritis, it might be a bit heavy to use. I do like how quickly it heats up and that we are able to do quite a bit before having to refill the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Left white spots and streaks
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with this product! Steam mopped wood floors twice; once with distilled water and a second time a week later with tap water. Both times the results were the same . . . streaking and chalky white spots throughout the house. Had purchased this item to replace my Shark that had died after 8 years of wonderful use. Gave this item a try because of the great reviews. Perhaps I got spoiled because my Shark was such a superior item. I'm returning this poor performing item and plan to repurchase a new Shark.
customer_reviews.author: SMo

customer_reviews.title: Gets heavy
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job but I agree with everyone on finger fatigue. Its also top heavy. Cleans grout like magic. I was also able to remove some nasty stains on my carseats. I would get the other Bissell that you can remove the canister and doesn't require you to keep your finger on the trigger to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell D Chase Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning Grout
customer_reviews.text: I will update the review in a few months with how it holds up, but out of the box this is awesome. I've tried several different methods to clean my grout and nothing worked as well as this. My kitchen looks like it did the first day I moved in. So happy I made this purchase and hope it continues to work this well. I will say it is a little uncomfortable to squeeze the steam button while cleaning, but still better than scrubbing the grout on your hands and knees with a toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Mascenik

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase!!! I manage a pretty large church (membership 800+) congregation. We use this to clean everything and it works wonders. You can see the dirt on the pad. Even though the church was just cleaned by a professional a year ago it gets lifts dirt from all those already cleaned spots. You can't go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What you need to know
customer_reviews.text: Love this steam mop for the PRICE. Could it put out more steam (only when I put on the mop head) , yes it could. But it does the job and love all the attachments. If you have a weak grip or small hands it may be more difficult to use due to how wide the handle is and where they keep the trigger. But I have OCD and it really helps with cleaning! You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah jane

customer_reviews.title: Not enough steam
customer_reviews.text: poor results. The steam output is very poor... I returned it and bought a dupray which actually has the steam production to clean. I also heard good things about the Wagner and McCulloch. Id look into those if price of the dupray is a little steep
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Buy the warranty since it will start messing up.
customer_reviews.text: Had no issues at first. Worked great, I was happy with it and so was my wife. It made some motor noise when I first got it, other reviews/questions said it goes away. Which it did. Now here I am few months later and it makes the motor noise constantly, doesn’t blow the steam like it used to. Not much pressure anymore after a few months. Didn’t get the warranty since it’s a good brand and never have had issues with things I’ve purchased in the past from any popular brands. Wish I did since it’s not working anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. I expected the steam would be a lot more and forceful coming from the handheld but I understand that it’s perfect for all the household purposes. Any more steam would be too much or dangerous. I have used it repeatedly on tasks ranging from messy oven clean up to hardwood floors and tile floor clean up. It works great. And it has a wide range of attachments that work for many surfaces including fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Post-20’s Domesticated Bliss
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve reached the point in your life where household appliances are exciting to you, this will not disappoint. The attachments are what post-20’s, domestic OCD dreams are made of. I have cleaned my floors, windows, cook top, tile, grout, shower - you name it - with this elegant beast.
customer_reviews.author: MayDay

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It’s good to lift up light and medium stains But those heavy duty ones it’s still need much work. Some of the brushes work great while the others I feel are useless. That grout scrubber sucks. The two large pans the one for scrubbing needs to be more rougher. I’m going to look for a different one in the future for tuff jobs.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Will change your life
customer_reviews.text: It is my right arm! Love it! I was looking for a way to get rid of chemical detergents. When my package delivered I just finished the cleaning and I used my steam mop for the first time. I needed to throw away the first mop because it turned black. I really could believe how dirty floor was even after my regular cleaning. Now I clean almost all the surfaces at home with it. Highly recommend for new moms too!
customer_reviews.author: bahar

customer_reviews.title: Get the add on insurance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product November 2019 it is now January or February and it stopped working so frustrating now I can’t return it😤
customer_reviews.author: Mckelleb

customer_reviews.title: Very good as sanitizing and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! It cleans strongly and deeply! Works great in my tile floors and bathroom tiles
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: My order came fast, easy to put together, Love that it came with the wall mount. It was easy to use. I was expecting it to go through way more water than it did. One measure did my mattress, headboard and floor. I used the mint and eucalyptus water and it left behind a great scent. Cant wait to use it on the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: This holds all water on top unit very. Heavy and the steam hardly comes out it takes me ten minutes for 3 sq feet. Granted I use my own disposable pads but this is useless for the huge price! If u have pet accidents don't bother. The steam hardly comes out.
customer_reviews.author: cat meower

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This moo has come on handy so many times. Just recently used on my camper with fantastic results. We were having allergy problems and by attaching a glider base and going over carpets I've noticed a huge improvement. I also use the hand held to decrease my air fryer and have used it on my large bay windows for a great clean. Absolutely love this steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Quality and Design
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this thing, but i was thoroughly disappointed! Firstly, although it claims to be lightweight, it is SO top-heavy that whenever I try to stand it up against the wall, it falls over (btw, it does not lock in place to stand independently). The water vessel should really be towards the bottom instead of the top so that this doesn't happen. Also, the scraper tool and another area of the mop broke within just a few uses. This product is grossly overpriced for the quality. Bissell can do better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that good.
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes with this steamer. :( it’s very heavy, top heavy and you have to push it hard while continually holding the trigger. The tools are really cheap.? I brought it mainly to clean grout but after doing only the breakfast room the tool was shot and I had to purchase another one. It does okay but difficult to use. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Strong

customer_reviews.title: The Bissell Slim takes off the finish from linoleum.
customer_reviews.text: This has happened twice. We have cleaned the floor with the Bissell and once the floor has dried there are marks/streaks on the floor which appear to originate from the end of the hose’s round area from where the steam comes.
customer_reviews.author: BJinLG

customer_reviews.title: I love this steamer
customer_reviews.text: Compact and lightweight with all the accessories you could need. I have had various Shark brand steamers throughout the years. They were good but this is another level. A little more money than other steamers but worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my grout since most of my apartment is tile. It works sooo good and I’m so happy with it. My floors look awesome. I love that you can detach and use it as a handheld. First day I got it I cleaned everything I could and I love it. Only down fall I see is it’s heavy other then that I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Penn

customer_reviews.title: I've only used it once and it works well
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once and it worked well. One product adjustment I'd make is being able to keep the steam "trigger button" locked vs. depressing it on your own while in use. This gets a little tiring for my hand.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: No one to contact
customer_reviews.text: I got new product but it does not work. Could not reach anyone in Israel or at amazon site. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: ronly

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS THING!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than trying to rent a steam cleaner. It has attachments that I didn't know I needed! The amount of steam is great especially for such a small tank. It's a little heavy but worth adapting too! Thanks Bissell!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Arlene Waghalter

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: Although I wouldn't recommend it, I could literally put my hands over the steam and only feel minimal heat most of the time. It basically didn't work as it was supposed to. I'm returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: st usa

customer_reviews.title: Cleans everything great!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I'll start by saying this thing cleans amazingly well! I literally stopped in the middle of cleaning to write a review. I just dont know where it's been all my life! Once I started using it I just couldn't wait to see what it would do. It is a bit bulky when using the hand held portion for small jobs. Doing the floors was a breeze. But my hand is getting tired from having to constantly hold down the button. That being said I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vennessa Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: I love this and did a lot of research before buying. The only two things I wish were improved were a bigger water tank and lightweight hand held as it seems to get heavy for me when doing a lot of cleaning. Overall would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Great mop replacement until it died
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of many of the reviews that claimed this mop died so quickly, but here I am 30 days past my allowable return date on Amazon and this steam mop is now dead. The pump inside of it sounds like it's about to explode and there is nothing serviceable on the unit, it's all glued together. So now we get to go deal with Bissel's support.
customer_reviews.author: Arlo Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Missing a part
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the flat scraper tool which is supposed to be in the toolbox. Not sure how to get this, however will update once I receive the part
customer_reviews.author: Just Cass

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Worked first three weeks now won’t heat up 98% of the time. Stopped heating sporadically after the third week, heats up whenever it wants too. Almost no steam comes out. I’m changing my review to 1 star and going to see about getting an exchange or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Would return it if I could...
customer_reviews.text: It is too heavy. Uncomfortable handle. Difficult to maneuver. Hard to maintain pressure on the steam button. Hard to get in and out of wall caddy.
customer_reviews.author: Petrea Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Just a notch above Shark
customer_reviews.text: Love this over the few Shark steak mops we had. It cleans our tile way better and it is much easier to use the accessories to steam shirts and steam clean than the Shark models.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ossler

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other Bissell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a different bissell model mop I had and it’s been disappointing. I don’t feel like it produces as much steam as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: K. P.

customer_reviews.title: worth buying
customer_reviews.text: perfect for well rounded cleaning around the house. it cleans and sanitize at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to assemble and replace parts for different uses. Someontimes that's the overwhelming part. Figuring out what can be used for what. Overall great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: ~D

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and not enough steamer
customer_reviews.text: Motor head with water tank make it super heavy Even though you just try to clean the floor. If i tried to use it to clean the wall, I cannt barely hold for 1 mins...... Not enough steamer for big floor head mop, either light for walks clean. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: just purchased

customer_reviews.title: All there products are great.
customer_reviews.text: My first one I received didn't work, they replaced it with no problem, only had me mail them the cord and sent me a whole new unit! Now I have two of all the accessories ,poles and bottom. Works great! I have a cleaning business, great for cleaning bathrooms and showers, and does awesome cleaning tile floors. All of my cleaning machines are by Bissell, vacuum, shopvac, upright duster vac( great for pet hair). Thank you Bissell for great service and products.

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning easier

product_meta.description: Steam clean anywhere with 3 machines in 1! the Bissell PowerFresh slim steam mop provides a superior clean both on and above your floors, converting from an upright steam mop to an extended reach surface cleaner to a portable handheld steam cleaner. Safe to use on all sealed hard floors such as hardwood, ceramic, linoleum, granite and marble. The on demand steam trigger allows you to dispense just the right amount of steam onto your floors. Steam clean multiple surfaces in your home with a variety of tools that can be used universally on both the extension wand and handheld steam cleaner.
